title: Chhandamtu hmangaihna ka hria
lyrics:
Chhandamtu hmangaihna ka hria;
Hmangaihna mak tak chu a lo ni;
Van atangin a lo chhuk a,
Min hmangaih leh min khawngaih em ni?

Ni, ni, ni, ka tan, ka tan,
Ni, ni, ni, ka tan;
Kan Lal a lo chhuk a,
Hmangaih tawp lovin,
kraws chungah a thi
Min chhandam nan.

A tuar leh a thi chhuahzia chu,
A chauh leh thinga a thih ka hria;
Khawiah emaw tal chu mi chu,
Min tuarsak leh a chauh sawi em ni?

Khi van chanchin khi ka hre tawh,
Isua miten an hmu dawn a ni;
Nimahsela, vanah khian hmun,
Ka tan buatsaih leh peih diam em ni?

Lalpa, ka zawhna che chhang la,
I hnen lovah khaw nge ka kal ang?
Thlarau Thianghlimin min hrilh la,
Ka tan van leh Chhandamtu awm chu.
